name: Amanosagume
description: Amanosagume is an evil god who loves chaos and has ambitions to resurrect in human form. Originally, Shiragiku (Hotaru) and Kugyou were the fruit of the actions of their parents who pleaded with the gods at the shrine to hope wealthier and easier life. Amanosagume heard the request and sent a 'blessing' to that couple in the form of twin fetuses who later were born as Shiragiku and Kugyo, which turned out to be disastrous for their parents. In fact, the fetus is a medium for Amanosagume to rise again. He takes advantage of the weak souls of desperate humans that pleads for divine favors without any effort. He needs the bodies of Shiragiku or Kugyo to be able to rise again and rule the world. Amanosagume made two innocent souls who didn't ask to be born in this world get karma they shouldn't have...
